description:
Jimbei continues his story with tales of fish-men taken as slaves, Queen Otohime`s fierce devotion to her people, the legend of Fisher Tiger, and the sinister rise of Arlong.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Hero Who Freed the Slaves! An Adventurer Tiger!
Dorei Kaihou no Eiyuu: Boukenka Tiger
El héroe que liberó a los esclavos. Tiger, el aventurero
Le héros qui sauva les esclaves ! L`aventurier Tiger !
البطل الّذي حرّر العبيد! المغامر تايغر!
奴隷解放の英雄 冒険家タイガー
